abilities.description: Marks a random player as a LIVING BOMB. After 6 seconds, they explode for 5,400-6,600 Arcane damage to everyone within 10 yards. The bomb player takes moderate damage as well.
abilities.handling: THE MOST IMPORTANT MECHANIC. If you get the bomb debuff, RUN AWAY FROM EVERYONE immediately. Get at least 15 yards from any other player. Do NOT run toward the healers. If you explode near the raid, you likely wipe. Watch your debuffs!

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: AoE knockback and 2,500-3,500 Arcane damage to everyone within 20 yards. Also disorients for 2 seconds.
abilities.handling: Melee should expect to be knocked back and disoriented. Run back in after it fades. Tanks should be positioned to avoid getting knocked away from the boss.

abilities.name: Split Phase - Adds
abilities.description: Every 50 seconds, Solarian teleports to a random room location, goes immune, and spawns 4 Solarium Agents (weak casters) and 2 Solarium Priests (healers that buff Agents).
abilities.handling: Kill Agents first - they cast Arcane damage on the raid. Then kill Priests. The Agents will gain Blessing of Might from Priests if you let Priests live. AoE damage works well. Solarian returns after 15-20 seconds.

abilities.name: Solarium Agent
abilities.description: Weak caster adds spawning during Split Phase. Cast Arcane spells at random targets.
abilities.handling: Kill quickly with AoE. Low HP but annoying if left alive.

abilities.name: Solarium Priest
abilities.description: Healer adds spawning during Split Phase. Cast Greater Heal on Agents and buff them with Blessing of Might.
abilities.handling: Lower priority than Agents but should die second. Interrupt heals if possible.

abilities.name: Void Form
abilities.description: At 20% HP, Solarian permanently transforms into a Voidwalker. She gains: Void Bolt (6,000 Shadow damage nuke), and Psychic Scream (AoE fear). No more bombs or split phases.
abilities.handling: Pop Heroism/Bloodlust and burn. Tank faces her away. Tremor Totems and Fear Ward help with Psychic Scream. This phase is simple - just avoid the fear and kill her.

bosses.strategy: POSITIONING: Tank Solarian in the center of the room. Raid spreads loosely around her - at least 10 yards between players for bomb explosions. Mark a 'bomb spot' far from the raid where bomb targets should run. PHASE 1: Tank and spank until bomb. When you get bomb, IMMEDIATELY run to the designated safe spot. During Split Phase (she vanishes), group up and AoE the adds - Agents first, then Priests. Return to spread positions when she comes back. PHASE 2 (Void Form at 20%): Pop cooldowns, group up for cleave/AoE heals, burn her down. Fear management with Tremor Totems helps. Simple burn phase.
commonMistakes: Not running out when you get bomb - wipes the melee or healers
Running the wrong direction with bomb - toward healers instead of away
Not spreading out enough during Phase 1
Ignoring adds during Split Phase, causing them to overwhelm healers
Panicking during Void Form fear instead of using Tremor/Fear Ward
lootHighlights: Leggings of the Vanquished Champion/Defender/Hero (Tier 5 Legs)

bosses.name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
bosses.description: The Lord of the Blood Elves and the most complex encounter in The Burning Crusade. This 5-phase, 15-20 minute fight is legendary for its difficulty and is considered by many to be the hardest boss in TBC. The fight features four advisors, seven legendary weapons, and the famous Gravity Lapse mechanic. Guilds spend weeks learning this encounter. Prepare for many, many wipes.
phaseBreakdown: Phase 1 (Advisors): Four advisors engage one at a time with 10-second gaps. Kill each before the next activates. ~3 minutes.
Phase 2 (Weapons): Seven legendary weapons animate and attack. Kill and LOOT them - they provide crucial buffs for later phases. ~2 minutes.
Phase 3 (Advisors Resurrected): ALL FOUR advisors resurrect at once. Kill them again while using your new weapons. ~2-3 minutes.
Phase 4 (Kael'thas Active): Kael'thas himself joins the fight. Manage Phoenixes, Mind Control, and high tank damage. ~5-6 minutes.
Phase 5 (Gravity Lapse - 50% HP): Everyone floats in the air. Avoid Nether Vapor orbs while DPSing Kael'thas. Cycles between flight and ground phases until dead.

advisors.name: Thaladred the Darkener (First)
advisors.abilities: Gaze: Fixates on a random player and chases them. Silence: AoE silence around him. Psychic Blow: Huge knockback on current target.
advisors.strategy: KITE HIM. Whoever gets Gaze runs away while ranged DPS kills him. He cannot be tanked traditionally. Stay spread to avoid Silence hitting multiple people.

advisors.name: Lord Sanguinar (Second)
advisors.abilities: Bellowing Roar: AoE fear. Standard melee attacks.
advisors.strategy: Normal tanking. Use Tremor Totem and Fear Ward for fear. Simple tank and spank compared to Thaladred.

advisors.name: Grand Astromancer Capernian (Third)
advisors.abilities: Fireball: 5,500-6,500 Fire damage. Conflagration: AoE 6,000+ Fire damage + DoT. Arcane Burst: 10,000+ damage if anyone is within 10 yards.
advisors.strategy: RANGED ONLY TANK. A Mage or Warlock tanks her at max range. She cannot be approached in melee due to Arcane Burst. Interrupt Fireballs if possible.

advisors.name: Master Engineer Telonicus (Fourth)
advisors.abilities: Bomb: Stuns target for 4 seconds. Remote Toy: Spawns robots that must be killed.
advisors.strategy: Normal tanking. Kill robots when they spawn. Watch for Bomb stuns on tanks - off-tank should be ready.

legendaryWeapons.name: Staff of Disintegration
legendaryWeapons.effect: +200% melee damage, reduces threat. CRITICAL for Phase 3+ DPS.

legendaryWeapons.name: Phaseshift Bulwark
legendaryWeapons.effect: Absorb shield on use. CRITICAL for Phase 5.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Standard 3-second cast dealing 15,000-20,000 Fire damage to the tank. Cast frequently.
abilities.handling: Tank needs to stay topped off at all times. Fire Resistance Aura and Fire protection potions help. Interruptible but Kael'thas has fast cast recovery.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: Places a Flamestrike on a random player's location. Deals 6,000-8,000 initial Fire damage plus 3,000/sec for 8 seconds in the zone.
abilities.handling: MOVE OUT of the red circle immediately. These zones persist and restrict movement space over time.

abilities.name: Phoenix
abilities.description: Summons a Phoenix add that leaves a trail of fire as it moves. When killed, it drops an egg. If the egg is not destroyed in 15 seconds, the Phoenix respawns.
abilities.handling: Assign a tank to kite the Phoenix away from the raid. Ranged DPS kills it, then IMMEDIATELY kills the egg. Missing an egg means dealing with another Phoenix.

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: Mind Controls a random player. The MC'd player gains 30% increased damage and can attack allies.
abilities.handling: CC the MC'd player with Polymorph, Fear, or other control. Do NOT kill them. The MC breaks after ~30 seconds or can be broken by the Staff of Disintegration weapon.

abilities.name: Shock Barrier
abilities.description: At set intervals, Kael'thas shields himself (100,000 damage absorb) and begins casting Pyroblast (10,000-12,000 Fire damage). If Pyroblast completes, someone dies.
abilities.handling: ALL DPS must STOP EVERYTHING and burn the Shock Barrier immediately. Breaking the barrier interrupts Pyroblast. This is a DPS check - failing means death.

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.description: Phase 5: Everyone is lifted into the air and can 'swim' in 3D space. Nether Vapor orbs spawn and deal 2,000 Shadow damage on contact. Lasts 30 seconds, then drops everyone to the ground.
abilities.handling: USE YOUR PHASESHIFT BULWARK before you hit the ground to absorb fall damage. While flying, avoid all orbs - they spawn from Kael'thas and drift toward players. Stay spread, keep DPSing. After landing, normal combat resumes until next Gravity Lapse.

abilities.name: Nether Vapor
abilities.description: Small purple orbs that spawn during Gravity Lapse. Each orb deals 2,000 Shadow damage and reduces max HP by 10% for 30 seconds on contact.
abilities.handling: AVOID ALL ORBS. The HP reduction stacks. Touching 3-4 orbs means you die when Gravity Lapse ends. Navigate carefully - they move slowly.

abilities.name: Nether Beam
abilities.description: During Gravity Lapse, Kael'thas fires Shadow beams at random players for 3,000 damage.
abilities.handling: Healers continue healing during Gravity Lapse. This is unavoidable damage.

bosses.strategy: PHASE 1: Kill advisors in order - Thaladred (kite), Sanguinar (tank), Capernian (ranged tank), Telonicus (tank). 10 seconds between each activation. PHASE 2: Kill all 7 weapons and LOOT THEM. Assign weapons before pull. Staff goes to Warlock, Bow to Hunter, etc. PHASE 3: All 4 advisors resurrect. CC Capernian immediately (Polymorph). Kill Thaladred first (still kite), then Sanguinar, then Telonicus, then Capernian. PHASE 4: Kael'thas is active. Tank and spank. Off-tank kites Phoenix, DPS kills Phoenix and egg. CC Mind Controlled players. When Shock Barrier appears, ALL DPS switches and breaks it before Pyroblast. PHASE 5 (50% HP): Gravity Lapse cycles. When flying, avoid orbs, DPS Kael'thas. Before landing, USE PHASESHIFT BULWARK. Ground phase resumes until next Gravity Lapse. Repeat until dead. Pop Heroism during a ground phase below 30%.
commonMistakes: Not looting weapons in Phase 2 - massive DPS and utility loss
Not using Phaseshift Bulwark before landing during Gravity Lapse - death
Failing to break Shock Barrier in time - Pyroblast kills someone
Letting Phoenix eggs hatch - doubled Phoenix problems
Standing near Capernian in Phase 3 - Arcane Burst kills melee
Touching multiple Nether Vapor orbs - HP reduction stacks = death
lootHighlights: Chestguard of the Vanquished Champion/Defender/Hero (Tier 5 Chest)
Ashes of Al'ar (from Al'ar, not Kael'thas)

phase3.name: Phase 3: Tier 6 Content
phase3.description: The third raiding tier features Mount Hyjal and Black Temple, home to Illidan Stormrage. These raids represent the pinnacle of TBC raiding before Sunwell.

mount_hyjal.name: The Battle for Mount Hyjal
mount_hyjal.attunement: Requires completing SSC and TK attunements
mount_hyjal.description: A unique wave-defense raid where you protect bases from Archimonde's forces alongside iconic Warcraft characters.
mount_hyjal.tierTokens: Tier 6 Gloves and Helm tokens drop here

bosses.name: Rage Winterchill
bosses.description: A Lich boss. First boss of Hyjal after surviving 8 waves of undead. Heavy frost damage.

abilities.name: Icebolt
abilities.description: Hits a random player for heavy Frost damage and stuns them.
abilities.handling: Heal stunned players immediately.

abilities.name: Frost Nova
abilities.description: AoE root and damage around Winterchill.
abilities.handling: Melee be ready to trinket or wait it out.

abilities.name: Frost Armor
abilities.description: Attackers have chance to be slowed.
abilities.handling: Melee just deal with it, not avoidable.

abilities.name: Death and Decay
abilities.description: Green zone on the ground dealing heavy Shadow damage.
abilities.handling: Move out immediately. Do not stand in it.

bosses.strategy: After clearing 8 trash waves, Winterchill spawns. Tank and spank. Spread out for Icebolt. Move from Death and Decay. Frost resist helps but isn't mandatory.

bosses.name: Anetheron
bosses.description: A Dreadlord boss. Second Hyjal boss with infernal rain and vampire mechanics.

abilities.name: Carrion Swarm
abilities.description: Frontal cone dealing Shadow damage and reducing healing by 75%.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front. Dispel healing reduction.

abilities.name: Sleep
abilities.description: Puts random players to sleep for 10 seconds.
abilities.handling: DPS through it or dispel.

abilities.name: Inferno
abilities.description: Calls down an Infernal on a random player location.
abilities.handling: Move away from impact zone. Off-tank picks up Infernal.

abilities.name: Vampiric Aura
abilities.description: Heals Anetheron for damage dealt.
abilities.handling: Burn through it with high DPS.

bosses.strategy: Tank away from raid for Carrion Swarm. Off-tanks pick up Infernals - kite them if needed. Dispel Sleep when possible. High DPS burn through Vampiric healing.

bosses.name: Kaz'rogal
bosses.description: A Doom Guard boss. Third Hyjal boss. Infamous mana drain mechanic that explodes players.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Frontal cleave hitting for heavy damage.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front.

abilities.name: War Stomp
abilities.description: AoE stun and damage.
abilities.handling: Healers spread to ensure not all are stunned.

abilities.name: Mark of Kaz'rogal
abilities.description: Drains mana from all players. If you hit 0 mana, you EXPLODE dealing 10k damage to nearby players.
abilities.handling: Mana users spread out. Use mana pots, Dark Runes, Innervate. If low, run away from raid before exploding.

bosses.strategy: Stack melee, spread healers and casters. When Mark goes out, use all mana consumables. Players about to explode must run out. Shadow Priests are MVP for mana return.

bosses.name: Azgalor
bosses.description: A Pit Lord boss. Fourth Hyjal boss. Players turn into demons on death.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Heavy frontal cleave.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front.

abilities.name: Rain of Fire
abilities.description: Fire rain on random locations.
abilities.handling: Move out immediately.

abilities.name: Howl of Azgalor
abilities.description: AoE silence for 5 seconds.
abilities.handling: Healers pre-HoT before Howl.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.description: Kills the target after 20 seconds. When they die, a Lesser Doomguard spawns.
abilities.handling: Doomed player should be healed until death, then off-tank picks up the add. Soulstone/Combat Res as needed.

bosses.strategy: Tank and spank with movement for Rain of Fire. Doomed players will die - have Soulstones ready. Off-tanks grab Lesser Doomguards. Coordinate healing through Howl silences.

bosses.name: Archimonde
bosses.description: The final boss of Mount Hyjal. Extremely punishing mechanics. Everyone gets Tears of the Goddess to survive Air Burst.

abilities.name: Air Burst
abilities.description: Launches a random player high into the air.
abilities.handling: USE TEARS OF THE GODDESS to slow fall! Without it, you die from fall damage.

abilities.name: Grip of the Legion
abilities.description: DoT on a random player that jumps to nearby players.
abilities.handling: Spread out 10+ yards. Dispel quickly.

abilities.name: Doomfire
abilities.description: Fire trail that chases players.
abilities.handling: Kite it away from raid. Do not let it touch anyone.

abilities.name: Fear
abilities.description: AoE fear.
abilities.handling: Tremor Totems, Fear Ward, Berserker Rage. Feared into Doomfire = death.

abilities.name: Soul Charge
abilities.description: When a player dies, Archimonde gains a Soul Charge. At 3 charges, he wipes the raid.
abilities.handling: DO NOT DIE. Every death brings raid closer to wipe.

abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.description: One-shots a player if no one is in melee range.
abilities.handling: Tank must ALWAYS be in melee range.

bosses.strategy: Spread out in a large semicircle. Use Tears immediately on Air Burst. Kite Doomfire away from raid. Do not die - 3 deaths = wipe. Keep tank in melee range at all times. Fear management is critical. This fight requires near-perfect execution.
commonMistakes: Forgetting to use Tears of the Goddess
Standing too close and spreading Grip of the Legion
Running into Doomfire while feared
Tank leaving melee range

black_temple.name: Black Temple
black_temple.attunement: Requires extensive questline through SSC and TK
black_temple.description: Illidan's fortress and the iconic TBC raid. Features 9 bosses including Illidan Stormrage himself.
black_temple.tierTokens: Tier 6 Chest, Legs, Shoulders, Bracers, Belt, and Boots tokens drop here

bosses.name: High Warlord Naj'entus
bosses.description: The first boss of Black Temple. Raid must break shields using Tidal Shield spines.

abilities.name: Needle Spine
abilities.description: Shoots spines at random players dealing damage.
abilities.handling: Healers keep raid topped.

abilities.name: Tidal Shield
abilities.description: Shields himself and impales a player with a spine. Shield must be broken.
abilities.handling: Looted spine must be used to break shield before he casts Tidal Burst.

abilities.name: Tidal Burst
abilities.description: Massive raid-wide Frost damage if shield isn't broken in time.
abilities.handling: Break shield FAST. Even with shield break, deals significant damage.

abilities.name: Impaling Spine
abilities.description: Impales a player, rooting them and dealing damage over time.
abilities.handling: Heal impaled player. When spine is removed, player can loot it.

bosses.strategy: Tank and spank until Tidal Shield. When someone gets Impaling Spine, heal them until spine is removed, then they loot it. Use spine to break Tidal Shield before Tidal Burst. Raid-wide healing needed after each burst.

bosses.name: Supremus
bosses.description: Giant Abyssal. Alternates between tank phase and chase phase.

abilities.name: Hateful Strike
abilities.description: Hits highest health target in melee range for massive damage.
abilities.handling: Multiple tanks stack in melee, highest HP gets hit.

abilities.name: Molten Punch
abilities.description: Punches the ground creating a fire line.
abilities.handling: Move out of fire lines.

abilities.name: Volcanic Geyser
abilities.description: Blue flames spawn under random players.
abilities.handling: Keep moving to avoid.

abilities.name: Gaze
abilities.description: Fixates on a random player and chases them.
abilities.handling: Gazed player must kite. Everyone else DPS while moving.

bosses.strategy: Phase 1: Multiple tanks soak Hateful Strike by being highest HP. Phase 2: Kite when Supremus gazes you. Keep moving to avoid Volcanic Geysers. Simple fight once you learn the dance.

bosses.name: Shade of Akama
bosses.description: Help Akama break free from his shade. Defend Akama while he channels.

abilities.name: Shade Soul Channel
abilities.description: Drains Akama's soul, making him vulnerable.
abilities.handling: Kill adds to allow Akama to channel back.

abilities.name: Ashtongue Defender
abilities.description: Adds spawn from sides that attack Akama.
abilities.handling: Off-tanks grab adds, DPS burns them.

abilities.name: Ashtongue Sorcerer
abilities.description: Caster adds that must be interrupted.
abilities.handling: Interrupt Rain of Fire. Kill sorcerers fast.

bosses.strategy: Akama channels to break free while adds spawn. Tanks grab adds, interrupt sorcerers. Once Akama reaches the Shade, burn the Shade. If Akama dies, wipe.

bosses.name: Teron Gorefiend
bosses.description: Death Knight boss. Players become ghosts and must manage Shadowy Constructs.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description: Heavy Fire damage to random player.
abilities.handling: Healers react quickly.

abilities.name: Shadow of Death
abilities.description: Marks a player. After 55 seconds, they die and become a ghost.
abilities.handling: Ghost player must use ghost abilities to kill Shadowy Constructs.

abilities.name: Crushing Shadows
abilities.description: Increases Shadow damage taken.
abilities.handling: Dispel immediately.

abilities.name: Doom Blossom
abilities.description: Spawns flowers that shoot Shadow Bolts.
abilities.handling: Move away from flowers.

bosses.strategy: Key mechanic: When you become a ghost, you get special abilities. Use them to kill Shadowy Constructs before they reach the raid. Practice on the flash game before attempting. Ghosts failing = wipe.

bosses.name: Gurtogg Bloodboil
bosses.description: Fel Orc boss. Requires careful tank rotation and raid stacking for Bloodboil.

abilities.name: Bloodboil
abilities.description: Hits the 5 closest players, dealing damage and applying a stacking DoT.
abilities.handling: Three groups rotate being closest to spread the stacks.

abilities.name: Acidic Wound
abilities.description: Stacking armor reduction on tank.
abilities.handling: Tank swap at high stacks.

abilities.name: Fel Rage
abilities.description: Targets a random player, buffing their HP but Bloodboil chases them.
abilities.handling: Fel Rage target becomes temporary tank. Healers focus them.

abilities.name: Arcing Smash
abilities.description: Frontal cone attack.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front.

bosses.strategy: Split raid into 3 groups. Groups rotate being closest to soak Bloodboil stacks. Tank swap on Acidic Wound. When Fel Rage goes out, that player becomes the tank temporarily. Complex coordination fight.

bosses.name: Reliquary of Souls
bosses.description: Three-phase fight against different aspects of souls. Each phase has unique mechanics.
phaseBreakdown: Phase 1 (Essence of Suffering): No healing works. DPS burns while taking damage.
Phase 2 (Essence of Desire): Damage dealt heals the boss. Manage Spirit Shock.
Phase 3 (Essence of Anger): Enrage mechanic. Pure burn phase.

abilities.name: Aura of Suffering
abilities.description: Phase 1 - Reduces healing to 0, drains health.
abilities.handling: Cannot heal. Just DPS fast. Mana users can lifetap/bandage.

abilities.name: Soul Drain
abilities.description: Phase 1 - Drains health from raid.
abilities.handling: Burn boss fast before raid dies.

abilities.name: Spirit Shock
abilities.description: Phase 2 - Interruptible nuke on random player.
abilities.handling: Interrupt rotation mandatory.

abilities.name: Aura of Desire
abilities.description: Phase 2 - 50% of damage dealt heals the boss.
abilities.handling: Controlled DPS. Don't go too fast.

abilities.name: Seethe
abilities.description: Phase 3 - Increases damage done and taken.
abilities.handling: Burn phase. Pop cooldowns.

abilities.name: Soul Scream
abilities.description: Phase 3 - Raid-wide damage and mana drain.
abilities.handling: Heal through it. Use mana pots.

bosses.strategy: Phase 1: No healing, just DPS. Phase 2: Interrupt Spirit Shock, controlled DPS. Phase 3: Bloodlust and burn. Each phase ends when the Essence reaches 0%.

bosses.name: Mother Shahraz
bosses.description: Shivan Priestess. Heavy Shadow damage - Shadow Resistance gear recommended.

abilities.name: Saber Lash
abilities.description: Cleaves the 3 closest targets, splitting damage.
abilities.handling: 3 tanks stack in front to split.

abilities.name: Fatal Attraction
abilities.description: Teleports 3 players together. They deal damage to each other.
abilities.handling: Teleported players run away from each other immediately.

abilities.name: Prismatic Aura
abilities.description: Random resistance aura that changes periodically.
abilities.handling: Can't control it. Shadow resist helps most.

abilities.name: Silencing Shriek
abilities.description: Silences everyone in front of her.
abilities.handling: Only tanks in front. Healers stay behind.

bosses.strategy: 3 tanks split Saber Lash in front. Raid behind. When Fatal Attraction hits, affected players spread. Shadow Resistance gear reduces incoming damage significantly.

bosses.name: The Illidari Council
bosses.description: Four-boss council fight. All must die within 15 seconds of each other.

abilities.name: Veras Darkshadow (Rogue)
abilities.description: Vanishes and uses Deadly Poison.
abilities.handling: Tank when visible, watch for Deadly Poison stacks.

abilities.name: High Nethermancer Zerevor (Mage)
abilities.description: Casts Arcane spells, Dampen Magic.
abilities.handling: Spell reflect tank or warlock tank with high resistance.

abilities.name: Lady Malande (Priest)
abilities.description: Heals other council members, casts Divine Wrath.
abilities.handling: Interrupt Circle of Healing. Kill first or second.

abilities.name: Gathios the Shatterer (Paladin)
abilities.description: Melee boss with Blessing of Protection and Consecration.
abilities.handling: Tank away from others. Blessing makes him immune to physical.

abilities.name: Circle of Healing
abilities.description: Malande heals all council members.
abilities.handling: MUST BE INTERRUPTED. Top priority.

abilities.name: Reflective Shield
abilities.description: Zerevor shields himself.
abilities.handling: Stop casting when shield is up.

bosses.strategy: Split raid. Tank Gathios away. Interrupt Malande constantly. Kill order varies by guild - usually Malande first. Balance DPS so all die within 15 seconds. Complex coordination required.

bosses.name: Illidan Stormrage
bosses.description: The final boss of Black Temple. Multi-phase encounter spanning 15+ minutes.
phaseBreakdown: Phase 1: Tank and spank with parasites.
Phase 2: Illidan flies, Flames of Azzinoth spawn.
Phase 3: Human form again, plus demon phase.
Phase 4: Maiev joins at 30%. Burn phase.
Phase 5 (Demon Form): Every 60 seconds, transforms into demon form.

abilities.name: Shear
abilities.description: Reduces max HP by 60% for 7 seconds.
abilities.handling: Tank must be Shear-immune (Shield Block, Shield Wall).

abilities.name: Draw Soul
abilities.description: Heals Illidan if target dies during this.
abilities.handling: Do not let the tank die.

abilities.name: Parasitic Shadowfiend
abilities.description: Spawns parasites from random players.
abilities.handling: Kill parasites quickly or they multiply.

abilities.name: Flame Crash
abilities.description: Fire zone on the ground.
abilities.handling: Move out immediately.

abilities.name: Dark Barrage
abilities.description: Phase 2 - Channels shadow damage at a player.
abilities.handling: Heavy healing on target.

abilities.name: Eye Beam
abilities.description: Phase 2 - Blue beam that tracks and kills.
abilities.handling: Run perpendicular to beam direction.

abilities.name: Flame Burst
abilities.description: Phase 3 - Fire damage to random players.
abilities.handling: Spread out, healers react.

abilities.name: Agonizing Flames
abilities.description: Demon phase - Massive fire AoE.
abilities.handling: Run to pre-assigned shadow spots.

abilities.name: Shadow Demons
abilities.description: Demon phase - Demons spawn and paralyze players.
abilities.handling: Kill demons FAST or paralyzed players die.

bosses.strategy: Phase 1: Tank Illidan, kill parasites. Phase 2: Kill Flames of Azzinoth, avoid Eye Beam. Phase 3: Back to normal, handle occasional demon phases. Phase 4: Maiev traps Illidan. Burn with Bloodlust. Phase 5 transitions happen throughout. Pre-position for Agonizing Flames.
commonMistakes: Tank dying to Shear without block up
Not killing parasites fast enough
Getting hit by Eye Beam
Shadow Demons reaching paralyzed targets

phase4.name: Phase 4: Zul'Aman
phase4.description: A 10-player timed raid set in the troll city of Zul'Aman. Features a 'bear run' achievement for completing bosses quickly.

zulaman.name: Zul'Aman
zulaman.description: A challenging 10-player raid with a timed 'bear run' mode. Completing bosses quickly before the timer expires rewards a special Amani War Bear mount.
zulaman.tierTokens: No tier tokens - drops unique badge-equivalent gear

bosses.name: Akil'zon
bosses.description: Eagle boss. First timed boss for bear mount run. Electrical storm mechanic.

abilities.name: Static Disruption
abilities.description: Debuff increasing Nature damage taken.
abilities.handling: Spread out to avoid chaining.

abilities.name: Gust of Wind
abilities.description: Knockback on random player.
abilities.handling: Stay away from edges.

abilities.name: Electrical Storm
abilities.description: Lifts a player into the air. Everyone must collapse under them.
abilities.handling: ALL players run directly under the floating player or you die to lightning.

abilities.name: Call Lightning
abilities.description: Lightning strikes a random player.
abilities.handling: Spread out, heal through it.

bosses.strategy: Spread out during normal phase. When Electrical Storm begins, EVERYONE collapses under the floating player. After storm, spread out again. Simple but punishing if people fail storm.

bosses.name: Nalorakk
bosses.description: Bear boss. Alternates between Troll and Bear form. Heavy tank damage.

abilities.name: Brutal Swipe
abilities.description: Troll form - Hits 2 targets in front.
abilities.handling: 2 tanks stack in front to split.

abilities.name: Mangle
abilities.description: Bear form - Bleeds the tank.
abilities.handling: Heal through the bleed.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Bear form - Charges a random player.
abilities.handling: Healers ready for charge damage.

abilities.name: Deafening Roar
abilities.description: Bear form - Silences the raid.
abilities.handling: Pre-HoT before Bear form.

bosses.strategy: Two tanks split Brutal Swipe in Troll form. Heavy healing in Bear form due to Mangle bleed. Straightforward tank and spank with form transitions.

bosses.name: Jan'alai
bosses.description: Dragonhawk boss. Egg management is key. Hatchers must be controlled.

abilities.name: Flame Breath
abilities.description: Frontal cone fire damage.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front.

abilities.name: Hatch All Eggs
abilities.description: At 35%, all remaining eggs hatch.
abilities.handling: Kill eggs evenly before 35% or get overwhelmed.

abilities.name: Fire Bomb
abilities.description: Fire bombs rain down in patterns.
abilities.handling: Find safe spots between bomb patterns.

abilities.name: Summon Amani Dragonhawk Hatcher
abilities.description: Hatchers run to eggs and hatch them.
abilities.handling: Control hatchers - kill one, let the other hatch eggs evenly on both sides.

bosses.strategy: Let one hatcher hatch some eggs at a time from both sides. Keep egg counts even. AoE dragonhawks as they spawn. Below 35%, all eggs hatch - if too many remain, wipe. Navigate Fire Bomb patterns.

bosses.name: Halazzi
bosses.description: Lynx boss. Spirit phase spawns a separate lynx that must be tanked.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Enrages at low health.
abilities.handling: Tranq shot or just heal through it.

abilities.name: Saber Lash
abilities.description: Frontal cleave.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front.

abilities.name: Spirit of the Lynx
abilities.description: At 75%, 50%, 25% - splits into troll and lynx.
abilities.handling: Off-tank grabs lynx. Kill lynx to force merge.

abilities.name: Flame Shock
abilities.description: Fire damage and DoT on random player.
abilities.handling: Dispel and heal.

abilities.name: Corrupted Lightning Totem
abilities.description: Spawns a lightning totem.
abilities.handling: Kill totem immediately.

bosses.strategy: Phase 1: Tank and spank. At HP thresholds, split phase occurs. Off-tank grabs lynx spirit. Kill lynx to end split phase. Kill totems immediately. Repeat through all split phases.

bosses.name: Hex Lord Malacrass
bosses.description: Hex Lord with 4 random adds. Steals abilities from players.

abilities.name: Spirit Bolts
abilities.description: Raid-wide shadow damage.
abilities.handling: AoE heals during Spirit Bolts.

abilities.name: Siphon Soul
abilities.description: Drains a player and gains their class abilities.
abilities.handling: Be prepared for stolen abilities - varies by class.

abilities.name: Drain Power
abilities.description: Drains stats from the raid.
abilities.handling: DPS burn before too many drains.

abilities.name: Stolen Ability
abilities.description: Uses abilities based on siphoned class (Lifebloom, Consecration, etc.).
abilities.handling: Dispel or interrupt stolen abilities when possible.

bosses.strategy: CC adds or kill them. Malacrass gains abilities from siphoned players - can get Lifebloom, Consecration, etc. Interrupt/dispel what you can. Burn boss before drain stacks too high.

bosses.name: Zul'jin
bosses.description: Final boss. Five phases, each based on an animal aspect. Complex multi-form fight.
phaseBreakdown: Phase 1 (Troll - 100%-80%): Standard melee with Grievous Throw.
Phase 2 (Bear - 80%-60%): Heavy tank damage, paralysis.
Phase 3 (Eagle - 60%-40%): Tornados and lightning.
Phase 4 (Lynx - 40%-20%): Fast cleaving, high raid damage.
Phase 5 (Dragonhawk - 20%-0%): Fire columns, burn phase.

abilities.name: Grievous Throw
abilities.description: Phase 1 - Bleeds until healed to full.
abilities.handling: Heal target to 100% to remove bleed.

abilities.name: Creeping Paralysis
abilities.description: Phase 2 - Stacking slow, becomes stun.
abilities.handling: Dispel before it stacks too high.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Phase 2 - Big hit on tank.
abilities.handling: Heavy tank healing.

abilities.name: Energy Storm
abilities.description: Phase 3 - Raid-wide nature damage.
abilities.handling: Heal through it.

abilities.name: Feather Vortex
abilities.description: Phase 3 - Tornados that move around.
abilities.handling: Avoid tornados.

abilities.name: Claw Rage
abilities.description: Phase 4 - Rapid attacks on tank.
abilities.handling: Heavy tank cooldowns and healing.

abilities.name: Lynx Rush
abilities.description: Phase 4 - Charges random players.
abilities.handling: Spread out, heal charge targets.

abilities.name: Flame Whirl
abilities.description: Phase 5 - Spawns fire columns.
abilities.handling: Move between fire columns.

abilities.name: Flame Breath
abilities.description: Phase 5 - Frontal cone fire.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front.

bosses.strategy: 5-phase fight, each with different mechanics. Heal Grievous Throw to full in P1. Heavy tank healing in P2. Avoid tornados in P3. Survive high damage in P4. Navigate fire in P5. Bloodlust in P5 for the burn.

phase5.name: Phase 5: Sunwell Plateau
phase5.description: The final and most challenging raid tier of The Burning Crusade. Sunwell Plateau features 6 brutal bosses leading to Kil'jaeden.

sunwell_plateau.name: Sunwell Plateau
sunwell_plateau.description: The ultimate TBC raid challenge. Home to Kil'jaeden, one of the hardest bosses in World of Warcraft history.
sunwell_plateau.tierTokens: Drops Tier 6.5 equivalent gear and unique weapons

bosses.name: Kalecgos
bosses.description: Blue dragon possessed by a demon. Fight occurs in two realms simultaneously.

abilities.name: Arcane Buffet
abilities.description: Normal realm - Stacking arcane debuff on tank.
abilities.handling: Tank swap at high stacks.

abilities.name: Frost Breath
abilities.description: Normal realm - Frontal cone frost damage.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front.

abilities.name: Spectral Blast
abilities.description: Teleports players to demon realm.
abilities.handling: Teleported players fight Sathrovarr in the demon realm.

abilities.name: Tail Lash
abilities.description: Hits players behind Kalecgos.
abilities.handling: Don't stand behind him.

abilities.name: Curse of Boundless Agony
abilities.description: Demon realm - DoT that increases over time.
abilities.handling: Must be dispelled, spreads to nearby players.

abilities.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
abilities.description: Demon realm - AoE shadow damage.
abilities.handling: AoE heals in demon realm.

bosses.strategy: Split raid between realms. Portal rotation moves players between fighting Kalecgos (normal) and Sathrovarr (demon realm). Both bosses must die within 10 seconds of each other. Coordinate DPS between realms.

bosses.name: Brutallus
bosses.description: Pit Lord. Pure DPS race and gear check. Often called the hardest gear check in TBC.

abilities.name: Meteor Slash
abilities.description: Massive fire damage split among targets in front.
abilities.handling: Entire raid stacks in front to split damage.

abilities.name: Burn
abilities.description: DoT that deals increasing fire damage. Spreads on expiration.
abilities.handling: Burn targets must run out before DoT expires to prevent spreading.

abilities.name: Stomp
abilities.description: AoE knockback and damage.
abilities.handling: Healers be ready for raid damage.

bosses.strategy: Stack entire raid in front for Meteor Slash. Burn targets run out before debuff expires. This is a pure DPS race - you need approximately 22k raid DPS to beat the 6-minute enrage. Full consumables mandatory.

bosses.name: Felmyst
bosses.description: Undead dragon. Ground and air phases with deadly breath mechanic.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Ground phase - Frontal cleave.
abilities.handling: Only tank in front.

abilities.name: Corrosion
abilities.description: Ground phase - Stacking armor debuff.
abilities.handling: Tank swap at high stacks.

abilities.name: Gas Nova
abilities.description: Ground phase - AoE damage and knockback.
abilities.handling: Spread loosely, heal through it.

abilities.name: Encapsulate
abilities.description: Ground phase - Traps a player in a cyclone.
abilities.handling: Heal the trapped player.

abilities.name: Demonic Vapor
abilities.description: Air phase - Green fog trails on the ground.
abilities.handling: DO NOT TOUCH. Standing in fog = instant death.

abilities.name: Fog of Corruption
abilities.description: Air phase - Massive breath attack.
abilities.handling: Run to safe spots. Anyone hit is mind controlled and nearly unkillable.

bosses.strategy: Ground phase: Tank and spank with tank swaps. Air phase: Felmyst flies and breaths - everyone runs to safe sides. Demonic Vapor leaves trails that mind control on contact. Extremely punishing mechanics.

bosses.name: Eredar Twins
bosses.description: Lady Sacrolash and Grand Warlock Alythess. Must be tanked apart and die together.

abilities.name: Shadow Nova
abilities.description: Sacrolash - AoE shadow damage.
abilities.handling: Spread out to minimize splash.

abilities.name: Confounding Blow
abilities.description: Sacrolash - Confuses the tank briefly.
abilities.handling: Off-tank ready to taunt.

abilities.name: Dark Touched
abilities.description: Sacrolash - Shadow debuff, removes Fire buff.
abilities.handling: Track debuffs, this removes Fire Touched.

abilities.name: Flame Sear
abilities.description: Alythess - Fire damage to random player.
abilities.handling: Heal through it.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Alythess - Fire zone under random player.
abilities.handling: Move out of fire.

abilities.name: Fire Touched
abilities.description: Alythess - Fire debuff, removes Shadow buff.
abilities.handling: Track debuffs, this removes Dark Touched.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.description: Alythess - Burns a player, spreading fire.
abilities.handling: Conflag target runs away from raid.

bosses.strategy: Tank twins 40+ yards apart. Having Dark Touched makes you take more Fire damage, and vice versa. Raid splits based on debuffs. Kill within 15 seconds of each other or surviving twin enrages.

bosses.name: M'uru
bosses.description: Naaru that transforms into Entropius. Considered hardest pre-nerf fight in TBC.
phaseBreakdown: Phase 1: Fight M'uru while controlling massive add waves.
Phase 2: M'uru transforms into Entropius - pure burn with void zones.

abilities.name: Negative Energy
abilities.description: Phase 1 - Raid-wide shadow damage.
abilities.handling: AoE heals constantly.

abilities.name: Darkness
abilities.description: Phase 1 - AoE pulse of shadow damage.
abilities.handling: Stay spread, heal through it.

abilities.name: Summon Dark Fiend
abilities.description: Phase 1 - Spawns Dark Fiends that chase players.
abilities.handling: Kite and kill Dark Fiends.

abilities.name: Summon Void Sentinel
abilities.description: Phase 1 - Large add from portals.
abilities.handling: Off-tank picks up Sentinels, kill them.

abilities.name: Void Zone
abilities.description: Phase 2 - Black holes on the ground.
abilities.handling: Move out immediately.

abilities.name: Singularity
abilities.description: Phase 2 - Entropius pulls players in.
abilities.handling: Run against the pull.

abilities.name: Negative Energy (P2)
abilities.description: Phase 2 - Increased raid damage.
abilities.handling: Spam heals, use cooldowns.

bosses.strategy: Phase 1: Extreme add control. Humanoid adds from left, Void Sentinels from right. AoE and single-target balance. Phase 2: Pure burn race. Avoid void zones, survive increasing damage. This fight broke many guilds.

bosses.name: Kil'jaeden
bosses.description: The final boss of TBC. Demon lord emerging from the Sunwell. Five-phase epic encounter.
phaseBreakdown: Phase 1 (100%-85%): Introduction phase with basic abilities.
Phase 2 (85%-55%): Shield Orbs and Flame Darts.
Phase 3 (55%-25%): Dragon Orbs for Darkness of a Thousand Souls.
Phase 4 (25%-0%): Armageddon meteors and final burn.

abilities.name: Soul Flay
abilities.description: Shadow bolt on the tank.
abilities.handling: Healers keep tank topped.

abilities.name: Legion Lightning
abilities.description: Chain lightning hitting multiple targets.
abilities.handling: Spread out to limit chains.

abilities.name: Fire Bloom
abilities.description: Fire debuff that jumps to nearby players.
abilities.handling: Affected players spread out.

abilities.name: Shield Orb
abilities.description: Orbs that shield KJ and shoot Shadow Bolts.
abilities.handling: Ranged DPS kills orbs quickly.

abilities.name: Flame Dart
abilities.description: Fire damage to random players.
abilities.handling: Healers top off dart targets.

abilities.name: Darkness of a Thousand Souls
abilities.description: Massive raid-wide damage after 8 second cast.
abilities.handling: Use Dragon Orbs to shield the raid.

abilities.name: Armageddon
abilities.description: Phase 4 - Meteors fall, must be soaked.
abilities.handling: Players stand in meteor shadows to soak. Multiple soakers per meteor.

abilities.name: Sinister Reflection
abilities.description: Creates shadow copies of random players.
abilities.handling: CC and kill reflections quickly.

bosses.strategy: Phase 1-2: Tank and spank with add management. Phase 3: Use Dragon Orbs during Darkness cast - blue dragons shield the raid. Phase 4: Soak Armageddons with multiple players per meteor. Bloodlust in Phase 4. This is the culmination of TBC raiding.
commonMistakes: Not clicking Dragon Orbs during Darkness
Not enough people soaking Armageddon meteors
Letting Shield Orbs live too long
Not spreading for Fire Bloom
